text: I have two daughters and they have been practicing here for almost 6 years, started as kid now became teenager. Kids are sometimes challenging to parents as they routinely say they want to stop sports, and this also happened to me several times too. But they continued taekwondo constantly- probably they enjoy the classes and I believe they like the teachers. Transparently said as a mum, One of the reason for consideration to continue a session is whether the center has good teachers, and from that perspectives I feel safe with this place. I plan to send my kids until they get their black belt and continue further according to their will to continue.

Mr Kim is a good instructor and my son thoroughly enjoys the lesson. The instructors are very skillful and they have a caring attitude. The staff at the Academy are very friendly and helpful. Very Happy to send my son here.

My kids enjoyed the classes here. They had fun while learning a skill. The coaches are good with kids and classes are combination of learning and fun while instilling discipline. Starting my youngest with the centre too!

Instructors are very friendly, kind and open. You will feel very comfortable participating lessons here if it's your first time. Very beneficial to you if you want to learn martial arts. Highly recommended to join!
Instructors are very friendly and kind. My child has been there since he was a white belt :) My son enjoyed the lesson very much
